name: Lettera di Kaedehara Yoshinori
desc: A blank piece of paper that was hidden in an old flower pot. When dipped in water, it reveals a long-sealed secret. After telling everyone about the truth that was concealed within, Kazuha said that "this letter may still be of use to you," before handing it over to you.

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Obtained from the Quest "True Tales of the Violet Garden: Act IV", during the "Hues of the Violet Garden" Event</color>
